POWERCFG.name: Disable PCI Link State Power Management
Increase Processor performance core parking min cores

DWORD.name: Enable show thumbnails instead of icons
Disable show window contents while dragging

REG_SZ.name: Enable smooth edges of screen fonts

DWORD.name: Disable use drop shadows for icon labels on the desktop
Disable use drop shadows for icon labels on the desktop

TWEAKS.name: Always hide most used list in start menu

DWORD.name: Disable show recently opened items in start, jump lists and file explorer

POWERCFG.name: Disable Processor performance time check interval

TWEAKS.name: Enable X2Apic and enable Memory Mapping for PCI-E devices
Disable synthetic TSC tick and use accurate RTC instead
TWEAKS.description: Disable synthetic TSC tick and use accurate RTC instead (not to be confused with useplatformclock). Enable HPET in BIOS for best results. Only for untweaked systems (TSC recommended instead on tweaked systems).

DWORD.name: Set a reliable 1 ms (minimum) timestamp
DWORD.description: Set a reliable 1 ms (minimum) timestamp. Only for untweaked systems (disabling it with 0 is recommended on tweaked systems).

TWEAKS.name: Enable Kernel-Managed Memory and disable Meltdown/Spectre patches

DWORD.name: Disallow drivers to get paged into virtual memory
Use big system memory caching to improve microstuttering

CMD.name: Use big pagefile to improve microstuttering
CMD.on: wmic computersystem where name="%computername%" set AutomaticManagedPagefile=False & wmic pagefileset where name="C:\\pagefile.sys" set InitialSize=32768,MaximumSize=32768
CMD.off: wmic computersystem where name="%computername%" set AutomaticManagedPagefile=True
CMD.lookup: wmic computersystem where name="%computername%" get AutomaticManagedPagefile

TWEAKS.name: Disable DMA memory protection
TWEAKS.description: Disable DMA memory protection and cores isolation ("virtualization-based protection").

TWEAKS.name: Disable kernel Memory Mitigations
TWEAKS.description: Disable some of the kernel memory mitigations. Causes boot crash/loops if Intel SGX is enforced and not set to \"Application Controlled\" or \"Off\" in your Firmware. Gamers don't use SGX under any possible circumstance.

TWEAKS.name: Avoid uncontiguous portions of low-memory
TWEAKS.description: Avoid the use of uncontiguous portions of low-memory from the OS. Boosts memory performance and improves microstuttering at least 80% of the cases. Also fixes the command buffer stutter after disabling 5-level paging on 10th gen Intel. Causes system freeze on unstable memory sticks.

TWEAKS.name: Disable 57-bits 5-level paging
TWEAKS.description: Disable 57-bits 5-level paging, also known as "Linear Address 57". Only 100% effective on 10th gen Intel. 256 TB of virtual memory per-disk is way much more than enough anyway.

CMD.on: powershell "Remove-Item -Path \"HKLM:\SOFTWARE\Microsoft\Windows NT\CurrentVersion\Image File Execution Options\*\" -Recurse -ErrorAction SilentlyContinue"

SERVICE.name: Disable Windows Push Notifications User Service
Disable Windows Defender Service (use Safe Boot)
Windows Defender Advanced Threat Protection Service
Disable Connected Devices Platform User Service
Disable Connected User Experiences and Telemetry
Disable Windows Defender Firewall and BFE
Disable Secure Socket Tunneling Protocol Service

SECTION.name: After setting IP manually ip config

TWEAKS.name: Decrease mouse and keyboard buffer sizes
Enable Experimental Autotuning and NEWRENO congestion provider

CMD.on: netsh int tcp set global autotuning=experimental & netsh int tcp set supp internet congestionprovider=newreno

CMD.name: Enable WH send and WH receive
Enable UDP offloading
CMD.on: netsh int udp set global uro=enabled
CMD.off: netsh int udp set global uro=disabled
CMD.lookup: netsh int udp show global | findstr /c:"Receive Offload State"

CMD.name: Enable Teredo and 6to4
CMD.on: netsh int teredo set state natawareclient & netsh int 6to4 set state state=enabled

CMD.name: Disable local firewall
CMD.on: netsh advfirewall set allprofiles state off
CMD.off: netsh advfirewall set allprofiles state on
CMD.lookup: netsh advfirewall show allprofiles state | findstr /c:"State"

CMD.name: Disable network discovery
CMD.on: netsh advfirewall firewall set rule group="Network Discovery" new enable=No & netsh advfirewall firewall set rule group="File and Printer Sharing" new enable=No

DWORD.name: Force contiguous memory allocation in the DirectX Graphics Kernel
Force contiguous memory allocation in the NVIDIA driver

TWEAKS.name: (NVIDIA GPU) Stop tolerating high DPC/ISR latencies
Allow scripts in CMD set-executionpolicy remotesigned

DWORD.name: Stop Tablet mode from automatically enabling in Registry
Disable enable open xbox game bar using game controller
Disable let websites show me locally relevant content by accessing my language list
Disable let windows improve start and search results by tracking app launches

TWEAKS.name: Disable personal inking and typing dictionary

DWORD.name: Disable store my activity history on this device
Disable cloud content search for work or school account
Open file explorer to this pc
Hide frequent folders in quick access

ITEM.name: Create restore point
ITEM.ARG: wmic.exe /Namespace:\\root\default Path SystemRestore Call CreateRestorePoint "EzTweak restore point", 100, 7

ITEM.name: Install timer resolution service
ITEM.ARG: echo Remember to Install C++ runtime before! https://aka.ms/vs/17/release/vc_redist.x64.exe & _SetTimerResolutionService.exe -install & sc config STR start=auto & net start STR
